column7: description
Unique identifier for the analysis performed for a particular set of samples
Unique identifier for the analyzed sample
For annotated gene, use Ensembl gene ID. Otherwise, use assemblyBuild_chr_start_end where assemblyBuild is hg18 or hg19.
Name of the chromosome containing the expressed gene/region interrogated
Strand of the chromosome containing the expressed gene/region
Start position of the gene on the chromosome
End position of the gene on the chromosome
Normalized count of sequencing reads if analyzed by sequencing platforms
Raw count of sequencing reads if analyzed by sequencing platforms
Normalized value of expression level if analyzed by microarray platforms
Expressed fold change if differential expression is measured
ID of the reference analyzed sample if differential expression is measured
Quality score for the expression call
Probability of the expression call
Indicate if the expressed fragment is annotated in Ensembl
Indicate if the expressed fragment has been validated
Platform or technology used in validation
ID of the probeset used in microarray
Optional field to leave notes
